unicloud-db.name: ## unicloud-db
unicloud-db.description:
> 组件类型：[UniCloudDBElement](#uniclouddbelement) 

 是一个数据库查询组件，它将clientDB的API封装为组件，进一步减少开发者使用所需的代码量。
unicloud-db.attribute:
### 属性 
| 名称 | 类型 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| id | string([string.IDString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","-","-","-","4.61"]]}' /> | 唯一标识 |
| v-slot:default | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | {data, loading, hasMore, pagination, error} |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| data | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 查询结果，类型为Array\<UTSJSONObject> |
@| loading | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 查询中的状态。可根据此状态，在template中通过v-if显示等待内容 |
@| hasMore | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否有更多数据。可根据此状态，在template中通过v-if显示没有更多数据了 |
@| error | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 查询错误。可根据此状态，在template中通过v-if显示等待内容 |
@| pagination | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 分页属性 |
@@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@@| current | - | 当前页号 |
@@| size | - | 分页大小 |
@@| count | - | 数据库的总数据量, 设置 :getcount=true 时有效 |
| collection | string([string.DBCollectionString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 表名 |
| field | string([string.DBFieldString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 查询字段，多个字段用 `,` 分割 |
| where | string([string.JQLString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 查询条件 |
| orderby | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 排序字段及正序倒叙设置 |
| groupby | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 对数据进行分组 |
| group-field | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 对数据进行分组统计 |
| distinct | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","3.93","4.11","-"]]}' /> | 是否对数据查询结果中重复的记录进行去重 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| true | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","-","-","-"]]}' /> | 去重 |
@| false | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","-","-","-","-"]]}' /> | 不去重 |
| page-data | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","-","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | add 多次查询的集合, replace 当前查询的集合 |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| add | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","4.41","-","-","4.61"]]}' /> | 多次查询的集合 |
@| replace | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["-","-","-","-","4.61"]]}' /> | 当前查询的集合 |
| page-current | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 当前页 |
| page-size | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 每页数据数量 |
| getone | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 指定查询结果是否返回数组第一条数据，默认 false。在false情况下返回的是数组，即便只有一条结果，也需要\[0]方式获取。在true下，直接返回结果数据，少一层数组 |
| getcount | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否查询总数量 |
| gettree | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否查询树状结构数据 |
| startwith | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | gettree的第一层级条件，此初始条件可以省略，不传startWith时默认从最顶级开始查询 |
| limitlevel | number | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | gettree查询返回的树的最大层级。超过设定层级的节点不会返回。默认10级，最大15，最小1 |
| manual | boolean | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 是否手动加载数据，默认为 false，页面onLoad时自动联网加载数据 |
| loadtime | string | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 加载数据时机，默认auto，可选值 auto\|onready\|manual |
@| 合法值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- |  :-: | :- |
@| auto | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 页面就绪后或属性变化后加载数据，默认为auto |
@| onready | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 页面就绪后不自动加载数据，属性变化后加载。适合在onLoad中接收上个页面的参数作为where条件时 |
@| manual | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 手动模式，不自动加载数据。如果涉及到分页，需要先手动修改当前页，在调用加载数据 |
| @load | (data : Array\<UTSJSONObject>, ended : boolean, pagination : [UTSJSONObject](/uts/buildin-object-api/utsjsonobject.md)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 成功回调。如联网返回结果后，想修改下数据再渲染界面，则在本方法里对data进行修改 |
| @error | (event: [UniEvent](/component/common.md#unievent)) => void | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","3.93","4.11","4.61"]]}' /> | 失败回调 |
| ~~action~~ | string([string.ClientDBActionString](/uts/data-type.md#ide-string)) | - | <CompatibilityTable table='{"headers":[{"title":"Web"},{"title":"微信小程序"},{"title":"Android"},{"title":"iOS"},{"title":"HarmonyOS"}],"rows":[["4.0","4.41","x","x","x"]]}' /> | 云端执行数据库查询的前或后，触发某个action函数操作，进行预处理或后处理(推荐改用JQL触发器) |

unicloud-db.component_type:
### UniCloudDBElement

#### UniCloudDBElement 的属性值
| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| dataList | Array\<UTSJSONObject> | 是 | - | 已加载的数据 |
#### UniCloudDBElement 的方法
##### loadData(options?: UTSJSONObject \| null): void @loaddata
加载数据
当 \<unicloud-db> 组件的 manual 属性设为 true 或者 loadtime 属性设置为 manual 时，不会在页面初始化时联网查询数据，此时需要通过本方法在需要的时候手动加载数据。
###### loadData 兼容性 
| Web | 微信小程序 | Android | iOS | HarmonyOS |
| :- | :- | :- | :- | :- |
| - | - | - | - | - |

##### 参数 

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
| options | **UniCloudDBComponentLoadDataOptions** | 否 | - | - | 可选参数 |
@| 名称 | 类型 | 必备 | 默认值 | 兼容性 | 描述 |
@| :- | :- | :- | :- |  :-: | :- |
@| clear | boolean | 否 | false | - | 是否清空数据 |
